tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_growth_stages (
  stage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stage_name VARCHAR(50),
  growth_description TEXT,
  optimal_conditions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FieldConditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    rain_volume DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CropFieldMapping (
    crop_id INT,
    field_id INT,
    stage_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldConditions(condition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (stage_id) REFERENCES CropGrowthStages(stage_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (crop_id, field_id, stage_id)
);

CREATE TABLE field_conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_area_id INT,
    temperature_celsius FLOAT,
    humidity_percent FLOAT,
    rainfall_mm FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_area_id) REFERENCES farm_areas(farm_area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    stage_id INT,
    date_recorded DATE,
    field_condition_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (stage_id) REFERENCES crop_growth_stages(stage_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_condition_id) REFERENCES field_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_stages (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stage_name VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  soil_moisture FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE field_conditions (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  weather VARCHAR(50),
  irrigation_needed BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_growth_stages(crop_id)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE,
  yield INT,
  field_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field_conditions(field_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  field_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field_conditions(field_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  reading DOUBLE,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
)
